Posts.Content: Hi it is the waiting around that is the hardest I found a lump end of November also, but had to wait for appointments. Told 23 December that I had BC and have just had sentinel lymph node biopsy yesterday. They are doing chemo before surgery so just have appointment with consultant today. This is a lovely group full of amazing support just keep talking stay strong and know you aren't alone Penny xx
Posts.Title: Told yesterday i have breast cancer
